title: Matej Mohorič Sounds GC Alarm for Tour de France Gravel Stage: ‘Accidents Can Happen Very Quickly’
content:
Gravel world champion predicts nervous stage over 14 sectors and 32.2km of gravel: 'The most limiting factor is that it is narrow. The gravel itself is quite fast.'

Read the full article at Matej Mohorič Sounds GC Alarm for Tour de France Gravel Stage: ‘Accidents Can Happen Very Quickly’ on Velo.
author: ahood
